About Me

A few things about myself...

BIO

Hello, my name is James and I have a passion for coding and problem solving. I recently relocated to Baltimore/Washington DC area from Morgantown, WV. I am a self taught programmer that began in Python but found my roots in front end development. I enjoy and work in multiple facets of coding from documentation to podcasts. My current skill set includes HTML/CSS/Javascript(ES6), Bootstrap 4, CSS Grid, Flexbox, SASS, MongoDB, Node.js, and React.js. While I work to master my current skills, I also find time to introduce challenges by adding in more skills along the way. I am the father of two beautiful cats, engaged, and have a slight obsession with finely brewed coffee. Cheers!
